name: Valore Consulting
goal:
We help companies in finding financial resources and tax breaks to achieve their own projects.

We simplify the path to obtain financial funds thanks to our expertise about procedures and laws.

We address companies towards strategic and organisational decisions for the growth.

We define a focused and personalised consultancy by providing specific solutions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
We want to deepen and enhance the quality of our job at this level.

We are targeting the area of the European Projects for SME, bringing our competency and expertise to a European level.

In 2018 we won two "SME Instrument - Phase 1" projects: we are very proud of this success, but this is just the first step for our Company.
customers: 3D Target SRL,Espansione Marketing S.p.A.,B&B Waterjet Abrasive SRL,GH Enterprise SRL,Euroequipe SRL,Radarmeteo SRL,Digital Dictionary Servizi SRL,A.T.G. SRL,Aluworld SA,Eurogames SRL,Jiki DOO,Glenair Italia SPA,IGB SRL,Canclini Tessile SPA,Oramed SRL,Skatolo SRLS,Wide Automation SRL
